verses.verse: Doth not wisdom<WH2451> cry<WH7121>, And understanding<WH8394> put forth<WH5414> her voice<WH6963>?
On the top<WH7218> of high places<WH4791> by the way<WH1870>, Where the paths<WH5410> meet<WH1004>, she standeth<WH5324>;
Beside the gates<WH8179>, at<WH3027> the entry<WH6310> of the city<WH7176>, At the coming<WH3996> in at the doors<WH6607>, she crieth aloud<WH7442>:
Unto you<WH376>, O men, I call<WH7121>; And my voice<WH6963> is to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>.
O ye simple<WH6612>, understand<WH995> prudence<WH6195>; And<WH3684>, ye fools, be of an understanding<WH995> heart<WH3820>.
Hear <WH8085>, for I will speak<WH1696> excellent things<WH5057>; And the opening<WH4669> of my lips<WH8193> shall be right things<WH4339>.
For my mouth<WH2441> shall utter<WH1897> truth<WH571>; And wickedness<WH7562> is an abomination<WH8441> to my lips<WH8193>.
All the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310> are in righteousness<WH6664>; There is nothing crooked<WH6617> or perverse in them<WH6141>.
They are all plain<WH5228> to him that understandeth<WH995>, And right<WH3477> to them that find<WH4672> knowledge<WH1847>.
Receive <WH3947> my instruction<WH4148>, and not silver<WH3701>; And knowledge<WH1847> rather than choice<WH977> gold<WH2742>.
For wisdom<WH2451> is better<WH2896> than rubies<WH6443>; And all the things that may be desired<WH2656> are not to be compared unto it<WH7737>.
I wisdom<WH2451> have made prudence<WH6195> my dwelling<WH7931>, And find out<WH4672> knowledge and discretion<WH1847>.
The fear<WH3374> of Jehovah<WH3068> is to hate<WH8130> evil<WH7451>: Pride<WH1344>, and arrogancy<WH1347>, and the evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, And the perverse<WH8419> mouth<WH6310>, do I hate<WH8130>.
Counsel <WH6098> is mine<WH8454>, and sound knowledge: I am understanding<WH998>; I have might<WH1369>.
By me kings<WH4428> reign<WH4427>, And princes<WH7336> decree<WH2710> justice<WH6664>.
By me princes<WH8269> rule<WH8323>, And nobles<WH5081>, even all the judges<WH8199> of the earth<WH776>.
I love<WH157> them that love<WH157> me<WH7836>; And those that seek me diligently shall find me<WH4672>.
Riches <WH6239> and honor<WH3519> are with me<WH6276>; Yea, durable wealth<WH1952> and righteousness<WH6666>.
My fruit<WH6529> is better<WH2896> than gold<WH2742>, yea<WH6337>, than fine gold; And my revenue<WH8393> than choice<WH977> silver<WH3701>.
I walk<WH1980> in the way<WH734> of righteousness<WH6666>, In the midst<WH8432> of the paths<WH5410> of justice<WH4941>;
That I may cause those that love<WH157> me to inherit<WH5157> substance<WH3426>, And that I may fill<WH4390> their treasuries<WH214>.
Jehovah <WH3068> possessed<WH7069> me in the beginning<WH7225> of his way<WH1870>, Before<WH6924> his works of old<WH4659>.
I was set up<WH5258> from everlasting<WH5769>, from the beginning<WH7218>, Before<WH6924> the earth was<WH776>.
When there were no depths<WH8415>, I was brought forth<WH2342>, When there were no fountains<WH4599> abounding<WH3513> with water<WH4325>.
Before the mountains<WH2022> were settled<WH2883>, Before<WH6440> the hills<WH1389> was I brought forth<WH2342>;
While as yet he had not made<WH6213> the earth<WH776>, nor the fields<WH2351>, Nor the beginning<WH7218> of the dust<WH6083> of the world<WH8398>.
When he established<WH3559> the heavens<WH8064>, I was there<WH2710>: When he set a circle<WH2329> upon the face<WH6440> of the deep<WH8415>,
When he made firm<WH5810> the skies<WH7834> above<WH4605>, When the fountains<WH5869> of the deep<WH8415> became strong<WH5810>,

When he gave<WH7760> to the sea<WH3220> its bound<WH2706>, That the waters<WH4325> should not transgress<WH5674> his commandment<WH6310>, When he marked<WH2710> out the foundations<WH4144> of the earth<WH776>;
Then I was by him<WH681>, as a master workman<WH525>; And I was daily<WH3117> his delight<WH8191>, Rejoicing<WH7832> always<WH6256> before him<WH6440>,
Rejoicing <WH7832> in his habitable<WH8398> earth<WH776>; And my delight<WH8191> was with the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>.
Now therefore<WH1121>, my sons, hearken<WH8085> unto me<WH835>; For blessed are they that keep<WH8104> my ways<WH1870>.
Hear <WH8085> instruction<WH4148>, and be wise<WH2449>, And refuse it not<WH6544>.
Blessed <WH835> is the man<WH120> that heareth<WH8085> me<WH8245>, Watching daily<WH3117> at my gates<WH1817>, Waiting<WH8104> at the posts<WH4201> of my doors<WH6607>.
For whoso findeth<WH4672> me findeth<WH4672> life<WH2416>, And shall obtain<WH6329> favor<WH7522> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
But he that sinneth<WH2398> against me wrongeth<WH2554> his own soul<WH5315>: All they that hate<WH8130> me love<WH157> death<WH4194>.
